title: Game not responding
body:
So when i start a game,after the champ select the logo shows up and it stays like that and the game doesn't load,and after I open the task manager it shows next to the game the it's not responding and it was like that for more than a month. I tried many solutions.I even uninstalled the game and reinstalled it and it still shows the same problem.
Can anyone please help me.

replies.body: There are a couple different things that could be going on here. First, make sure that your client is still functioning properly by running through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). After that, let's go ahead and ensure your OS has all of the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place as well.

I did everything in the crash guide and permissions and I still have the same problem.

Edit:
So i tried opening it again before going to sleep and it worked.
thanks for your help :)

Since those two options didn't help, it really sounds like some of the game files might not be working properly for some reason. Go ahead hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to take a closer look into this for you!
